CreateInstanceByApi.document: This API is used to create  instance
CreateInstanceByApi.name: Create Instance

DescribeAccounts.document: This API is used to obtain the account list corresponding to the instance.
DescribeAccounts.name: Describe accounts

DescribeDBParams.document: This API is used to describe instance configurations.
DescribeDBParams.name: Describes instance configurations

DescribeErrorLog.document: This API is used to query error logs.
DescribeErrorLog.name: Describe error logs

DescribeInstance.document: This API is used to query the instance information by an instance ID.
DescribeInstance.name: Describe instance information

DescribeInstanceInfo.document: This API is used to get instance information.
DescribeInstanceInfo.name: Describe Instance information

DescribeInstanceNodes.document: This API is used to list nodes.
DescribeInstanceNodes.name: Describe Instance Nodes

DescribeInstanceOperations.document: This API is used to get operations of the instance .
DescribeInstanceOperations.name: Describe Instance Operations

DescribeInstanceState.document: This API is used to display instance status, process progress, etc., in the instance details page.
DescribeInstanceState.name: Get the status of a instance

DescribeInstances.document: This API is used to get a list of  instances.
DescribeInstances.name: Gets a list of  instances

DescribeSimpleInstances.document: This API is used to get a list of instance
DescribeSimpleInstances.name: Get a list that includes the simplified information of instance

DescribeSlowLog.document: This API is used to query slow SQL logs.
DescribeSlowLog.name: Queries slow SQL logs

DescribeUpgradeList.document: This API is used to obtain instance upgrade records.
DescribeUpgradeList.name: Obtains instance upgrade records

DestroyInstanceByApi.document: This API is used to destroy instance.
DestroyInstanceByApi.name: Destroy Instance

ModifyDBParameters.document: This API is used to modify instance configurations
ModifyDBParameters.name: Modify instance configurations

ModifyInstance.document: This API is used to modify instance information. Only the name of an instance can be modified currently.
ModifyInstance.name: Modifies instance information

ModifyUserHba.document: This API is used to modify user Hba configurations.
ModifyUserHba.name: Modifies user Hba

ResetAccountPassword.document: This API is used to change account password.
ResetAccountPassword.name: Resets the password

RestartInstance.document: This API is used by users to proactively restart instances in the console.
RestartInstance.name: Restarts instance

ScaleOutInstance.document: This API is used to scale out instance.
ScaleOutInstance.name: Scale Out Instance

ScaleUpInstance.document: This API is used to scale up instance in the console.
ScaleUpInstance.name: Scales up instance

UpgradeInstance.document: This API is used to upgrade Instance.
UpgradeInstance.name: Upgrade Instance

members.document:
Parameter types. Valid values: enum, string, and section. Enum indicates enumeration, namely utf8, latin1, gbk. String indicates that the returned parameter value is a string. Section indicates that the returned parameter value is a value range, for example, 4-8.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: Type

members.name: Enum
